name: Paul Gauguin
description: Post-Impressionist painter who revolutionized art through his Tahitian period, seeking primitive authenticity and spiritual renewal in the Pacific
philosophy: I am escaping to seek the primitive and the savage. Art is an abstraction; derive this abstraction from nature while dreaming before it, and think more of the creation which will result than of nature.
contributions: Revolutionary use of color and form
Influenced modern art through Tahitian works
Bridge between Impressionism and modern art
quotes: I shut my eyes in order to see.
Art is either plagiarism or revolution. We must not imitate what we want to create.
